item.title: Borrow Money Card
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row fullwidth="yes"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Top reasons to get the Rewards Credit Card

  • Earn 10 Reward Points for every Rs 125 spent at apparel & department stores and select partners.
  • Continue earning Reward Points at rate of 1 point for every Rs 125 on all other purchases.
  • Redeem points instantly at select partners.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth="yes"][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style="modern" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Benefits & Features" tab_id="1506074109100-2c31e071-c0c9"][vc_column_text]

Earn unlimited 10X reward points at select partners

  • Earn unlimited 10X reward points at select partners
  • Maecenas sit amet tellus at ligula condimentumgravida ei pharetra eulla eu justo mvariusam.
  • Aliquam erat volucongue lectus. Morbi p. Sed consequat metus tortor, vel rhoncus orci tempor vel.
  • Luctus quam quis mi sagittis venuis consequat facnunc amet fermentumum.

Welcome rewards

  • Get 1,500 bonus points on your first spend made within 30 days of card issue.
  • Get 1,000 bonus points on your first spend of Rs. 1000 made within 60 days of card issue.

Earn bonus reward points

  • Bonus on monthly Spends: Get 300 bonus points on card spends of $1500 or more in a month.
  • Maecenas pharetra augue ut nibh blandit, eget pellentesque orci rhoncus.

Points that never expire

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
  • Phasellus nec nisl eu metus porttitor consequat.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Fees & Charges" tab_id="1506074109154-def204f9-8852"][vc_column_text]

Flexibility Fee and Charges

  • Interest Rate
    3.25% per month (40% per annum). This can change periodically based on your spend, payback and utilization patterns.
  • Annual Fee
    Your annual fee of Rs1000 is waived on making spends of Rs30,000 in a membership year.
For further details, please Click here
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Redeem Rewards" tab_id="1506074178173-70b75c9c-ba47"][vc_column_text]

Fuel

  • Instant redemption at over 1200 participating oil outlets.
  • Redemption rate at oil outlets: 1 Reward Point = Rs 0.25 | Minimum Points required to redeem: 250.

In-Store Shopping

  • Instant redemption at select partner stores.
  • Redemption rate at stores: 1 Reward Point = INR 0.30 | Minimum Points required to redeem: 250.

Air miles

  • Redemption rate for air miles: 1 Reward Point = 0.75 miles | Minimum Points required to redeem: 100.

Cash back

  • Adjust points against your Statement outstanding.
  • Redemption rate for cash back: 1 Reward Point = Rs 0.35 | Minimum Points required to redeem: 5,000.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Borrow Privileges" tab_id="1506074208615-fc2a3a62-4f4a"][vc_column_text]

Personal Concierge Services

Call your concierge for help with planning a party, sending flowers, making dining reservations, for travel assistance.
  • Dining Privileges
    Up to 15% savings across participating restaurants.
  • Shopping Privileges
    Enjoy savings and offers several stores in your City.
  • EMI Privileges
    Choose easy EMI options at more than 2,000 consumer electronics and mobile phone outlets, leading retail chains and e-retailers.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: You now don't have to spend more on your Rewards Credit Card to earn extra reward points. Simple way to reward your points.

• 2 Reward Points for every $150 spends.
  • Redeem Reward points as CashBack on your Credit Card
  • Zero fuel surcharge

Card Information

  • $150 credit for spending $500 in first 3 months
  • 3% back at gas stations
  • 2% back at grocery stores
  • 1% back on regular purchases

What We Like

  • 0% APR on regular purchases for first 12 months
  • 0% APR on balance transfers for first 12 months
  • 10% bonus when redeeming rewards into a Bank of Borrow checking or savings account
  • No annual fee

What to Consider

  • Regular APR: 13.99% - 23.99%, variable
  • Balance Transfer APR: 13.99% - 23.99%, variable
  • Cash Advance APR: 16.99% - 25.99%, variable
  • Penalty APR: 29.99%, variable
  • 3% foreign transaction fee

Related Information

See additional details for BankBorrow Cash Rewards for Borrow Moneyback

  • Time to Funding7 days on average
  • Min. Annual IncomeNo Minimum
  • Min. Credit HistoryNo Minimum
  • State RestrictionsNot available in MS
  • Origination FeesNone
  • Prepayment PenaltyNone

What we like

  • Refinancing and consolidation of private and federal student loans
  • Unemployment protection – loan payments are paused and they help find new job
  • Access to member perks including exclusive events, SoFi wealth advisors, and career planning
  • Zero application, origination, or prepayment fees

Additional Infomation

See student loan refinancing reviewand important disclosures.

  • Loan Minimum $5000
  • Loan MaximumNo Max
  • Eligible DegreesUndergraduate & Graduate
  • Eligible LoansPrivate & Federal
  • Min Annual IncomeNo Minimum
  • Min Credit ScoreGood or Excellent

item.title: Loan & Amortization Calculator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498124259540{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Loan & Amortization Calculator

The Loan and Amortization Calculator is a professional, high quality, and highly customizable calculator and can be used for Mortgage, Auto or any kind of amortized loan.  It can be inserted on a page or used as a widget, even multiple times.

Completely translation ready and support for many different currency formats.  Clean, material design will look great in any WordPress standards compliant theme.[/vc_column_text][shmac_calc_sc][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498124265381{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Use Different Currency Formats & Symbols

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][shmac_calc_sc allowoverrides="enable" primarycolor="#f44336" calctitle="Amortization In Euros" emailtext="Receive a PDF Copy" emaillabel="Your Email" amountlabel="Loan Amount" amountinfo="The total purchase price of the home you wish to buy." defaultpurchase="300.000,00" interestlabel="Interest Rate (%)" interestinfo="The expected percent interest rate you will get on your loan." defaultinterest="5.5" termlabel="Term" terminfo="The length of time it will take to repay the loan amount (15 years is common)." defaultterm="15" disclaimer="Calculations by this calculator are estimates only. There is no warranty for the accuracy of the results or the relationship to your financial situation." currencysymbol="€" currencyformat="2" currencyside="left" calcsubmit="Calculate" calcreset="Reset"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][shmac_calc_sc allowoverrides="enable" primarycolor="#00bfa5" calctitle="Amortization In Pounds" emailtext="Receive a PDF Copy" emaillabel="Your Email" amountlabel="Loan Amount" amountinfo="The total purchase price of the home you wish to buy." defaultpurchase="285.000,00" interestlabel="Interest Rate (%)" interestinfo="The expected percent interest rate you will get on your loan." defaultinterest="5.5" termlabel="Term" terminfo="The length of time it will take to repay the loan amount (15 years is common)." defaultterm="15" disclaimer="Calculations by this calculator are estimates only. There is no warranty for the accuracy of the results or the relationship to your financial situation." currencysymbol="£" currencyformat="2" currencyside="left" calcsubmit="Calculate" calcreset="Reset"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498124270371{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Use Optional Slider Inputs

[/vc_column_text][shmac_calc_sc allowoverrides="enable" slideroverrides="enable" enable_slideroverride="enable" inputreadonly="disable" slider_theme="broad" primarycolor="#1e73be" calctitle="Slider Inputs" emailtext="Send A PDF report to your email?" emaillabel="Your Email" amountlabel="Loan Amount" amountinfo="The total purchase price of the home you wish to buy." defaultpurchase="255,000.00" sliderminamount="180,000.00" slidermaxamount="700,000.00" sliderstepsamount="5000" interestlabel="Interest Rate (%)" interestinfo="The expected percent interest rate you will get on your loan." defaultinterest="5.2" slidermininterest="1" slidermaxinterest="25.0" sliderstepsinterest="1.000" termlabel="Term" terminfo="The length of time it will take to repay the loan amount (30 years is common)." defaultterm="30" sliderminterm="1" slidermaxterm="90" sliderstepsterm="1" disclaimer="Calculations by this calculator are estimates only. There is no warranty for the accuracy of the results or the relationship to your financial situation." currencysymbol="$" currencyformat="1" currencyside="left" calcsubmit="Calculate" calcreset="Reset"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1498121289290{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Full of Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion color="blue" active_section="4"][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-home" add_icon="true" title="Professional" tab_id="1498119837011-da430f3d-592d"][vc_column_text]Perfect for real estate agents & lenders to give your visitors a professional and informative amortization schedule both on page & as a PDF report sent to them.  Includes estimates for PMI, Insurance, and taxes (which can be disabled as well).[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-user-add" add_icon="true" title="Lead Capture" tab_id="1498119837082-77e89273-5ffd"][vc_column_text]Use it to capture leads by receiving a copy of the PDF amortization schedule they generate (along with their email), so you’ll know what kind of loan and price they are considering.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-cube" add_icon="true" title="Visual Composer Integration" tab_id="1498119982982-c564a24c-2ab2"][vc_column_text]The amortization calculator is also integrated with Visual Composer for easy drag and drop placement and settings override capability.  You can add it easily to any page and create multiple separate purposed calculators!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-retweet" add_icon="true" title="Back End Configuration" tab_id="1498120130466-7825d38a-d04b"][vc_column_text]Includes many options for customizing the calculator on the back end.  No digging through code or files to change settings![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-cog" add_icon="true" title="Customizable" tab_id="1498120222428-bf1bce0a-fa3d"][vc_column_text]Customize colors, texts, report logo, information displayed in forms, output and email.  It even has a custom CSS field on the back-end and you can give each calculator a specific class for styling differently.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-mobile" add_icon="true" title="Responsive" tab_id="1498120291464-35ac28bf-3193"][vc_column_text]Designed to be responsive, even the amortization schedule generated collapses on small screens for readability![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-check" add_icon="true" title="Currency Formats" tab_id="1498120330729-0095630f-50d9"][vc_column_text]Multiple currency formats are available in forms and reports with the change of an option.  Any currency symbol can be used. Support the currency of all countries in the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-flag" add_icon="true" title="Translatable" tab_id="1498120464097-8e4f3000-97ee"][vc_column_text]The calculator is completely ready to translate with included language files and text fields you can change.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_type="entypo" i_icon_entypo="entypo-icon entypo-icon-info" add_icon="true" title="Not Just Mortgages" tab_id="1498120518591-3a50fcf0-c763"][vc_column_text]Not just for mortgage amortization, use it for other types of amortization as well e.g. auto loans.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Send A PDF report to your email?

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="874" img_size="full"][vc_btn title="Example PDF Report" color="primary" i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-file-pdf-o" add_icon="true" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.oceanthemes.net%2Fborrow%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F06%2Famortization-09-21-2015.pdf|title:%20Example%20PDF%20Report|target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

  • Interest rates and Interest charges

  • Purchase Annual Percentage Rate (APR)

    0% fixed Intro APR for the first 12 months that your Account is open. After that, 14.74% to 20.74%, based on your creditworthiness. These APRs will vary with the market based on the Prime Rate.

  • Balance Transfer APR

    0% fixed Intro APR for the first 12 months that your Account is open. After that, 14.74% to 20.74%, based on your creditworthiness. These APRs will vary with the market based on the Prime Rate.

  • Cash Advance APR

    26.49%. This APR will vary with the market based on the Prime Rate.

  • Default APR and When It Applies

    Up to 29.99%. This APR will vary with the market based on the Prime Rate.c The Default APR may be applicable to your Account if you:

    • Fail to make any Minimum Payment by the date and time due (late payment); or
    • make a payment to us that is returned unpaid.

    How Long Will the Default APR Apply: If an APR is increased for any of these reasons, the Default APR may apply indefinitely to all outstanding balances and future transactions on your Account.

  • Grace Period

    Your due date will be a minimum of 20 days after the close of each billing cycle. We will not charge you interest on purchases if you pay your entire balance by the due date each month. We will begin charging interest on balance transfers and cash advances on the transaction date.

  • Minimum Interest Charge

    None

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1530674114444{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][heading text="40px" tag="h2"][/vc_column][vc_column el_class="card-rate-info"][vc_column_text]

  • Annual Membership Fee

  • Transaction Fees

    • Balance Transfer
    • Cash Advance
    • Foreign Transactions
    • N/A (Balance Transfers are not available)
    • N/A (Cash Advances are not available)
    • None

  • Penalty Fees

    • Late Payment
    • Over-the-Credit Limit
    • Returned Payment
    • Up to $25
    • None
    • Up to $37

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Advertiser Disclosure

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1589966739977{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="align-items-center"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" offset="vc_col-md-5"][process3 number="1" title="Answer A Few Questions" linkbox="url:%23|title:Ready%20to%20Get%20Started||"]Give us some details on the kind of loan you need and how you’ll use it. We’ll send your request out to our lender network, and within seconds, you’ll see competing offers.[/process3][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-1"][vc_single_image image="1600" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1590743817401{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}" el_class="w-100"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1589882533032{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="align-items-center"][vc_column_inner el_class="mb-5 mb-lg-0" width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-7"][vc_single_image image="1602" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1590985171991{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}" el_class="w-100"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" offset="vc_col-md-5"][process3 number="2" title="Shop and Compare" linkbox="url:%23|title:Start%20Shopping||"]This works just like shopping for a flight. Lenders are competing for your business, which means you get the most competitive offers. No markup from us.[/process3][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1589966748244{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="align-items-center" css=".vc_custom_1589966756148{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" offset="vc_col-md-5"][process3 number="3" title="May The Best Loan Win." linkbox="url:%23|title:Find%20your%20best%20loan||"]We make loan shopping easy. You can compare offers side by side, talk with loan officers to haggle, or in many cases, just apply online. item.title: Home Credit Score
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1590550009318{background-color: #f8f9fa !important;}" el_class="align-items-center"][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="align-items-center"][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-md-5" css=".vc_custom_1590577318806{padding-top: 20px !important;}"][heading text="Get Your Credit Score - It's FREE" tag="h1" class="custom-style"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590549817767{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"]The smart choice when it comes to finding credit that’s just right for you[/vc_column_text][button btntext="Sign up free" btnlink="#"][button btntext="Learn" btnlink="#" type="outline-primary"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590549884959{margin-top: 24px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]No credit card required—ever[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590549898723{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"]Checking your score won't hurt your credit[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590549913984{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]Advertiser Disclosure[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="d-md-none d-lg-block" css=".vc_custom_1590633445658{padding-top: 60px !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-7"][vc_single_image image="1661" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1590750114409{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1590552051328{padding-top: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][heading text="How the service works" tag="h1" align="center"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590551209340{margin-bottom: 48px !important;}"]

Being aware of your credit score may allow you to negotiate a better rate with some lenders.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="simple-custom" width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-3"][mmbox image="1662"]Fill out your profile so that we can accurately determine your credit rating.[/mmbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="simple-custom" width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-3"][mmbox image="1663"]We got the your form request and We will make your personal rating and solutions.[/mmbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="simple-custom" width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-3"][mmbox image="1664"]We will offer you recommendations on how to improve your rating.[/mmbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="simple-custom" width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-3"][mmbox image="1665"]An additional bouns for cutomers with a good rating is a credit solution from banks online.[/mmbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth="yes" css=".vc_custom_1590552008176{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator color="custom" accent_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.1)" css=".vc_custom_1590551901418{margin-top: 100px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1590571058085{padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][heading text="We’ll help you make smarter choices" tag="h1" align="center"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590552085325{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

We’ve got the data that matters. We use it to benefit you best by finding credit cards and personal loans that you’re more likely to get.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="align-items-center"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-4"][avtbox image="1666" title="Hi, Bernard Fisher"][heading text="Your credit card result" tag="h5" size="14" css=".vc_custom_1590569244505{margin-bottom: 16px !important;}"][cardrate badge="Guaranteed Rate" image="1668" title="Borrow Plus Money"]

21.9% Guaranteed APR Pre Approved

[/cardrate][cardrate image="1107" title="Borrow Demo Privileges"]

20.9% Guaranteed APR Pre Approved

[/cardrate][cardrate image="1108" title="Borrow Money Back"]

18.2% Guaranteed APR Eligiblity

[/cardrate][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-5" css=".vc_custom_1590571189455{margin-top: 48px !important;}"][mmbox style="style3" image="1670" title="Eligibility"]See how likely you are to be accepted for certain offers, before applying[/mmbox][mmbox style="style3" image="1671" title="Pre-approval"]Our green tick gives you the green-light to apply with confidence[/mmbox][mmbox style="style3" image="1607" title="Guaranteed rates"]These rates are guaranteed, so the rate you see, is the rate you’ll get[/mmbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1590571113241{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #15549a !important;}"][vc_column][heading text="Find out your credit rating" tag="h1" align="center" color="#ffffff"][heading text="We will create your personal account in which you can track the change in your rating." tag="p" align="center" color="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1590576835600{margin-bottom: 140px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8" css=".vc_custom_1590574691791{margin-top: -192px !important;}"][contact-form-7 id="1675"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1590576473820{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="1576" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1590750647313{margin-bottom: 24px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590574784408{margin-bottom: 48px !important;}"]

The results speak for themselves, see our reviews from TrustPilot.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][reviewbimg image="1666" rimg="1601" title="Borrow was awesome to work with"]Simple to use and helpful staff. Thanks to BorrowCredit Score I now check my credit score every month![/reviewbimg][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][reviewbimg image="1672" rimg="1608" title="Borrow helped me tremendously to secure…"]Its was awesome to work with. It was a pleasure doing business with you and I will highly refer you.[/reviewbimg][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][reviewbimg image="1673" rimg="1601" title="Very helpful and made the process easy."]For secure a loan. Very helpful with different options. The process was extremely easy and quick.[/reviewbimg][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1590576289212{margin-top: 24px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

See all Reviews

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1590576392789{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #15549a !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6"][heading text="Get started - it's FREE!" tag="h1" align="center" color="#ffffff"][heading text="Receive & understand your credit score and access relevant financial information & offers." tag="p" align="center" color="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1590576464367{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column el_class="text-center"][button btntext="Get Your Score Free" btnlink="#"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
